Can shuffle via RNG Shuffle method
Can register players
Can register multiple players
Can have multiple players join
Can properly limit player size to 4 hands (1 hand per player)
Can properly limit player size to 4 hands (1 player with 4 hands)
Can properly limit player size to 4 hands (3 hands for mc player, 1 for ai)
Does force number of hands to 1 and bet amount to min bet on player join
Can properly process change hand commands from player
Can prevent invalid change hand commands from player (max)
Can prevent invalid change hand commands from player (min of 1)
Can follow double down rules
Can use changeHandTo to properly set number of hands
Can validate min / max number of hands
Can use changeHandBy to call changeHandTo with proper arguments
Can force min per hand rule on multiple hands (checks sum of hands)
Can compute proper bankroll after changing number of hands
Can use changeBetTo to properly change bet amount
Can validate min / max bet amount
Can use changeBetBy to call changeBetTo with proper arguments
Checks hand before hit
Checks bet amount and rules before double down
Checks bet amount, rules, and hand before split
Checks bet amount, rules, and dealer hand before insurance
Can join game at specified positions
Cannot join game at occupied positions
GameController should have proper flowOrder property
Can do a full round rotation (all one hand and no hits)
